divs: Sighting Details just before dark on the evening i described, i was walking up our dirt drive (heading west) when a ball of fire came from the south toward the north about 150 feet+- in the air...it seemed to be going parallel to the ground...then before it went out of sight, it turned downward...toward some dense woods...down in a low area...my brother and i would hunt and play down there...i never went to look for what it might have been...our house was about 5 miles the way the crow flies, to ft. rucker, alabama...it is a helicopter training base for flight training...one of the most stategic in the u.s...i thought it might have been a helicopter but that would have been big news...they do crash form tmie to time...the instructor pilots live here in the southeast...i've often wonder what it was...i thought maybe a meteorite...that would be something important... what i saw i can not idenify...is this something to look into?..frank
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Enterprise
There were no other sightings in Enterprise on or around August 15th 1962
